title: Great price for this outstanding apartment in koreatown !
map_address: La Fayette Park Place near Beverly Blvd.
posting_body: ['Recently renovated apartments close to the heart of Los Angeles', 'Our spacious apartments are located in a prime neighborhood with convenient access to the 101 freeway, shops, parks, and schools.', 'Rental unit amenities include :', '- Stove', '- Heater, A/C', '- Spacious closets', '- New laminate flooring', '- Fresh paint', '- Free water and trash services', '-12 month leases', '-Pet allowed with pet rent and pet deposit', 'The building has a full-size swimming pool with a heated Jacuzzi and a fitness room.', 'We also offer on-site laundry room and a gated parking garage with elevators.', 'Make an appointment today and stop by for a personal tour of the premises.', '(pictures may not be up to date, call to confirm)', 'Park Pointe Apartments', '211 S. La Fayette Park Place L.A CA 90057', 'Phone :', 'show contact info']
